Contributor: Knickerbocker, H. E., artist.; Victory Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "E.H. Knickerbocker." Date based on date of the Victory Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for the Victory Liberty Loan campaign. The text tells about Harold W. Roberts, Corporal, Co. A., 344th Battalion, Tank Corps. It says that he gave his life for you, so invest to make his sacrifice significant. Illustration shows a tank trapped in a shell hole, filled with water.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: America's immortals : Harold W. Roberts
